      • loadNativeLibrary

        public static boolean loadNativeLibrary(java.io.File libDirectory)
                                 throws java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError

        Extract native library from jar in a working directory and load it. Also load vendor's library.

        Parameters:
        directoryPath - directory in which native library will be extracted and vendor library will be found
